Sentence.value: Cervix cryosurgery is a surgical treatment to freeze and destroy abnormal tissue in the cervix.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Cervix [[cryosurgery|C0010408]] is a [[surgical treatment|C0543467]] to freeze and destroy abnormal tissue in the cervix.

Sentence.value: Risks for any surgery are: - Bleeding - Infection Cryosurgery may cause scarring of the cervix, but most of the time it is very minor.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Risks for any [[surgery|C0543467]] are: - Bleeding - Infection [[Cryosurgery|C0010408]] may cause scarring of the cervix, but most of the time it is very minor.
